english: Why are you buying this bag?

turkish: Bu tatili ne zaman planladınız? (to plan)
english: When did you plan this vacation?
How did you solve this problem?

turkish: Onun köpeğini neden dışarı çıkarmadın? (to take out)
english: Why didn’t you take his dog out?
Where did he put his bag?

turkish: Kim onun kitabını ödünç aldı? (to borrow)
Bu kitabı ne için kullanıyorsunuz? (to use)
english: What are you using this book for?
How did you improve his project?

turkish: Onun kararını ne zaman kabul ettiniz? (to accept)
english: When did you accept his decision?

turkish: Onun sorumluluğunu kim devraldı? (to take over)

english: Why did you reject his suggestion?
How did you learn his idea?

turkish: Onun planını ne zaman açıklayacaklar? (to announce)
english: When will they announce his plan?
